code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SearchSection=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const[searchTerm,setSearchTerm]=useState("");const[yearFilter,setYearFilter]=useState("");const handleSearch=()=>{if(!searchTerm.trim()&&!yearFilter.trim()){alert("üö® Please enter a district or a year to search.");return;}const params=new URLSearchParams();if(searchTerm.trim())params.set("district",searchTerm.trim());if(yearFilter.trim()){params.set("startYear",yearFilter.trim());params.set("endYear",yearFilter.trim());}navigate(`/search-results?${params.toString()}`);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"text-center py-16 bg-gradient-to-b from-white to-red-300",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-4xl font-extrabold",children:"Find Past HDB Resale Transactions"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"mt-3 text-lg",children:"Search by district and/or year to see past resale prices."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mt-6 flex justify-center gap-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:searchTerm,onChange:e=>setSearchTerm(e.target.value),placeholder:"Search by district (e.g., Woodlands)",className:"border px-4 py-3 rounded-lg w-96"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:yearFilter,onChange:e=>setYearFilter(e.target.value),placeholder:"Year (optional)",className:"border px-4 py-3 rounded-lg w-48"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"bg-red-600 text-white px-8 py-3 rounded-lg hover:bg-red-700 transition",onClick:handleSearch,children:"\uD83D\uDD0D Search"})]})]});};export default SearchSection;
